verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> ye <S%H1004>this<s%>, O house of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, who are <S%H7121>called<s%> by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and are come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; who <S%H7650>swear<s%> by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, but not in <S%H571>truth<s%>, nor in <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>

(for they <S%H7121>call<s%> themselves of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H5564>stay<s%> themselves upon the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name<s%>):

I have <S%H5046>declared<s%> the former <S%H7223>things<s%> from of <S%H227>old<s%>; <S%H3318>yea<s%>, they went forth out of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and I <S%H8085>showed<s%> <S%H6597>them<s%>: suddenly I <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H935>them<s%>, and they came to pass.
Because I <S%H1847>knew<s%> that thou art <S%H7186>obstinate<s%>, and thy <S%H6203>neck<s%> is an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H1517>sinew<s%>, and thy <S%H4696>brow<s%> <S%H5154>brass<s%>;

therefore I have <S%H5046>declared<s%> it to thee from of <S%H227>old<s%>; before it came to <S%H935>pass<s%> I <S%H8085>showed<s%> it <S%H559>thee<s%>; lest thou shouldest say, Mine <S%H6090>idol<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H6459>them<s%>, and my graven image, and my molten <S%H5262>image<s%>, hath commanded <S%H6680>them<s%>.

Thou hast <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H2372>it<s%>; behold all <S%H5046>this<s%>; and ye, will ye not declare <S%H8085>it<s%>? I have showed thee new <S%H2319>things<s%> from this <S%H6258>time<s%>, even hidden <S%H5341>things<s%>, which thou hast not <S%H3045>known<s%>.

They are <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H6440>now<s%>, and not from of old; and before this <S%H3117>day<s%> thou <S%H8085>heardest<s%> them <S%H559>not<s%>; lest thou shouldest say, <S%H3045>Behold<s%>, I knew them.

Yea <S%H8085><s%>, thou heardest <S%H3045>not<s%>; yea, thou knewest <S%H241>not<s%>; yea, from of old thine ear was not <S%H6605>opened<s%>: for I <S%H3045>knew<s%> that thou didst deal <S%H898>very<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%>, and wast <S%H7121>called<s%> a <S%H6586>transgressor<s%> from the <S%H990>womb<s%>.
For my <S%H8034>name<s%>'s sake will I <S%H748>defer<s%> mine <S%H639>anger<s%>, and for my <S%H8416>praise<s%> will I <S%H2413>refrain<s%> for <S%H3772>thee<s%>, that I cut thee not off.
Behold <S%H6884><s%>, I have refined <S%H3701>thee<s%>, but not as silver; I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> thee in the <S%H3564>furnace<s%> of <S%H6040>affliction<s%>.
For mine own <S%H6213>sake<s%>, for mine own sake, will I do <S%H2490>it<s%>; for how should my name be profaned? and my <S%H3519>glory<s%> will I not <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%>.
Hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H3290>me<s%>, O Jacob, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> my <S%H7121>called<s%>: I am <S%H7223>he<s%>; I am the first, I also am the <S%H314>last<s%>.

Yea <S%H3027><s%>, my hand hath laid the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and my right <S%H3225>hand<s%> hath <S%H2946>spread<s%> out the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>: when I <S%H7121>call<s%> unto <S%H5975>them<s%>, they stand up <S%H3162>together<s%>.

Assemble <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8085>yourselves<s%>, all ye, and hear; who among them hath <S%H5046>declared<s%> these <S%H3068>things<s%>? He whom Jehovah <S%H157>loveth<s%> shall <S%H6213>perform<s%> his <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> on <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and his <S%H2220>arm<s%> shall be on the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>.
I <S%H1696><s%>, even I, have spoken; <S%H7121>yea<s%>, I have called <S%H935>him<s%>; I have brought <S%H1870>him<s%>, and he shall make his way <S%H6743>prosperous<s%>.

Come <S%H7126><s%> ye <S%H7126>near<s%> unto <S%H8085>me<s%>, hear ye <S%H7218>this<s%>; from the beginning I have not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in <S%H5643>secret<s%>; from the <S%H6256>time<s%> that it <S%H136>was<s%>, there am I: and now the Lord <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H7307>me<s%>, and his Spirit.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, thy <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%>, the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, who <S%H3925>teacheth<s%> thee to <S%H3276>profit<s%>, who <S%H1869>leadeth<s%> thee by the <S%H1870>way<s%> that thou shouldest <S%H3212>go<s%>.

Oh <S%H3863>that<s%> thou hadst <S%H7181>hearkened<s%> to my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>! then had thy <S%H7965>peace<s%> been as a <S%H5104>river<s%>, and thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> as the <S%H1530>waves<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>:

thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> also had been as the <S%H2344>sand<s%>, and the <S%H6631>offspring<s%> of thy <S%H4578>bowels<s%> like the <S%H4579>grains<s%> <S%H8034>thereof<s%>: his name would not be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> nor <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> from before <S%H6440>me<s%>.

Go ye <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, <S%H1272>flee<s%> ye from the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>; with a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>singing<s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> <S%H8085>ye<s%>, tell <S%H3318>this<s%>, utter it even to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3068>ye<s%>, Jehovah hath <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.

And they <S%H6770>thirsted<s%> not when he <S%H3212>led<s%> them through the <S%H2723>deserts<s%>; he caused the <S%H4325>waters<s%> to <S%H5140>flow<s%> out of the <S%H6697>rock<s%> for <S%H1234>them<s%>; he clave the <S%H6697>rock<s%> <S%H4325>also<s%>, and the waters gushed <S%H2100>out<s%>.
There is no <S%H7965>peace<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
